mapper.select: select * from payment p join payment_detail pd on p.payment_num = pd.payment_num join user u on u.user_id = p.user_id join payment_method pm on pm.method_num = p.method_num where p.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update payment p join payment_detail pd on p.payment_num = pd.payment_num set p.state = 0 where p.payment_num = #{paymentNum} and pd.product_num = #{productNum};

insert.foreach: insert into payment_detail(payment_num, product_num, quantity, price) values (#{paymentNum}, #{item.productNum}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.price})

update.foreach: update product set inventory_quantity = inventory_quantity - #{item.quantity} where product_num = #{item.productNum}

delete.foreach: delete from cart where user_id = #{userId} and product_num = #{item.productNum}

mapper.select: select pay.*, p.delivery_info, pd.product_num from payment pay join payment_detail pd on pay.payment_num = pd.payment_num join product p on p.product_num = pd.product_num where p.delivery_info = '2~3일 소요'

select pay.*, p.delivery_info, pd.product_num from payment pay join payment_detail pd on pay.payment_num = pd.payment_num join product p on p.product_num = pd.product_num where p.delivery_info = '당일배송'
mapper.update: update payment set state = state + 1 where payment_num = #{paymentNum} and product_num = #{productNum}
update payment p join payment_detail pd on p.payment_num = pd.payment_num set p.state = 4 where p.payment_num = #{paymentNum} and pd.product_num = #{productNum};
